Tool

NamePatching
ID5
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2003
Specificationgrid

Description

Fill gaps of a grid with data from another grid.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Grid Grid (input)ORIGINAL
Patch Grid Grid (input)ADDITIONAL
Output
Completed GridGrid (output)COMPLETED
Options
ResamplingChoiceRESAMPLINGAvailable Choices: [0] Nearest Neighbour [1] Bilinear Interpolation [2] Bicubic Spline Interpolation [3] B-Spline Interpolation Default: 3
